name: We Come In Peace?
description:
Greg Orbulus Gregourious Orborbulous (aka Gogo) must obey the commands of Supreme Leader Ogog! Gogo, a low-level cosmic dispatcher for the Galactic League of Authoritarian Democracies (GLAD) must collect resources and do Ogog's bidding. He will travel from planet to planet around the solar system serving his commanding, iron-handed boss. Gogo hops to each of his objectives by utilizing a homeworld HUB portal.

          He will travel to a small farm on a planet called "Earth", sorting and teleporting their livestock back to the Galactic League.  On a primitive water planet, he will maneuver a dizzying maze to take their precious machine-activated water resource. On the planet UrklyBurkly, Gogo will be tasked to get rid of those pesky enemy Urkles as the Supreme Leader commands! When his tasks are finally completed, he can return to the hub and kick up his feet... But, if he fails, he'll be fired from GLAD and thrown out into Space! Will he be able to finish his mission?
